安妮斯顿·巴内特 (Aniston Barnette) 作为美国心脏协会的全国青少年影响力领导心肺复苏教育计划美国心脏协会的“全国青少年影响力”称号为 Z 世代变革者提供了一个有影响力的平台，以对抗心脏病，改善全国社区的健康和福祉。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Aniston-Barnette-leads-CPR-education-initiative-as-American-Heart-Associations-National-Teen-of-Impact.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Aniston-Barnette-leads-CPR-education-initiative-as-American-Heart-Associations-National-Teen-of-Impact.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ba9a5538-31fb-40e4-ac87-df62c7ce6557 Wed, 15 May 2024 10:54:00 -0400 Aniston Barnette leads CPR education initiative as American Heart Association's National Teen of Impact
研究表明，乳酸对于缓冲碳水化合物膳食的影响至关重要作为一名在帕利尔高中参加田径比赛的学生，罗伯特·莱哈 (Robert Leija) 痴迷于如何提高自己的表现，特别是如何防止训练期间肌肉中乳酸的积聚。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Lactate-is-essential-to-buffering-the-effects-of-a-碳水化合物-meal-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Lactate-is-essential-to-buffering-the-effects-of-a-碳水化合物-meal-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=41327188-3913-4a86-b10f-e2238450936e Wed, 15 May 2024 10:47:54 -0400 Lactate is essential to buffering the effects of a carbohydrate meal, study shows
研究量化了儿童肥胖对长期健康和预期寿命的影响在意大利威尼斯举行的欧洲肥胖大会 (ECO)（5 月 12 日至 15 日）上发表的新研究首次量化了儿童肥胖不同方面对长期健康和预期寿命的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Research-quantizes-impact-of-childhood-obesity-on-long-term-health-and-life-expectancy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Research-quantizes-impact-of-childhood-obesity-on-long-term-health-and-life-expectancy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0f8672f2-4570-4bfb-9ec3-eaaf78f98c90 Wed, 15 May 2024 10:40:00 -0400 Research quantifies impact of childhood obesity on long-term health and life expectancy
研究建议降低 40 岁以上成年人肥胖的 BMI 界限根据今年欧洲肥胖大会上发表的研究，国际公认的肥胖体重指数 (BMI) 分界点可能不适合中老年男性和女性（40-80 岁）。 ECO）在意大利威尼斯（5 月 12 日至 15 日）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Study-proposes-lower-BMI-cut-off-for-obesity-in-adults-over-40.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Study-proposes-lower-BMI-cut-off-for-obesity-in-adults-over-40.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=66020555-0aa2-45a3-8e57-023e91ffc463 Wed, 15 May 2024 10:37:20 -0400 Study proposes lower BMI cut-off for obesity in adults over 40
研究表明，仅靠技术不足以有效减轻肥胖者的体重西北医学的一项新研究表明，在肥胖治疗中，仅靠技术无法取代人性化的接触来产生有意义的减肥效果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Technology-alone-insufficient-for-meaningful-weight-loss-in-obesity-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Technology-alone-insufficient-for-meaningful-weight-loss-in-obesity-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=31ed7d4c-9a47-4d3a-8f8f-ccdfbd90313e Wed, 15 May 2024 10:27:00 -0400 Technology alone insufficient for meaningful weight loss in obesity, study shows
收入和教育与降低中风后死亡率有关今天在 2024 年第十届欧洲中风组织会议上公布的新研究显示，高收入人群中风后死亡的风险降低了 32%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Income-and-education-linked-to-lower-post-中风-mortality.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Income-and-education-linked-to-lower-post-中风-mortality.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d8ff1459-4af6-48ec-930e-2e5bf7e125f3 Wed, 15 May 2024 08:25:15 -0400 Income and education linked to lower post-stroke mortality
研究揭示女性健康应用程序的隐私风险伦敦大学学院和伦敦国王学院的最新研究表明，专为女性健康监测而设计的应用程序因数据处理不当而使用户面临不必要的隐私和安全风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Study-reveals-privacy-risks-in-female-health-apps.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Study-reveals-privacy-risks-in-female-health-apps.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=45111041-6148-460d-8727-9186450dad89 Wed, 15 May 2024 08:08:46 -0400 Study reveals privacy risks in female health apps

为什么纽约的一个卫生系统停止起诉患者乔林·蒙格纳斯特 (Jolynn Mungenast) 整天都在寻找帮助人们支付医院账单的方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Why-one-New-York-health-system-stopped-suing-its-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Why-one-New-York-health-system-stopped-suing-its-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ed726017-af07-4f66-b421-f53c3e51b32e Wed, 15 May 2024 06:47:32 -0400 Why one New York health system stopped suing its patients
